scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd reactjs && yarn install && cd ../ && cd firebase/functions && yarn install
scripts.deploy:all: npm run verify && cd reactjs && npm run deploy && cd ../firebase/functions && npm run deploy

scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run tsc
